text: Ma'am, I'm Officer Johnson. Can I see your driver's license and registration, please?
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Sure, officer. Here you go. Is there a problem?
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: Your taillight is out, ma'am. Did you know that?
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Oh, really? I didn't even notice. I'm so sorry.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: No worries, ma'am. Just wanted to let you know. I'm going to have to write you a warning.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Oh, thank goodness. I'm so glad it wasn't anything serious.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: Just be sure to get that taillight fixed as soon as possible. It's a safety hazard.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: I will, officer. Thank you for letting me know.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: Here's your license and registration. Have a good night, ma'am.
speaker: SPEAKER_00
